author: Jason Fendick
description: Jason's original recipe called for raisin infused gin and I'd recommend you make this drink that way if time permits.
name: Gypsy Cocktail
recipeIngredient: 15 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°brix)
15 ml Chilled water (reduce if wet ice)

recipeInstructions.text: MUDDLE rosemary and raisins with gin in base of shaker
Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
